physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Initial examination revealed no palpable liver or spleen enlargement.
Physical examination showed moderate anemia, abdominal distention, and massive splenomegaly [Line 1: 12cm; Line 2: 13cm; Line 3: +5cm].
Moderate splenomegaly was observed [Line 1: 8.5 cm; Line 2: 9 cm; Line 3: -2 cm].
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Post-HSCT, the spleen size gradually reduced.
